title: YAMS JSON API
description: Input format for YAMS' JSON API. The JSON schema can be found [here]().

$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema. Typically ``.

configuration_identifier.description: Properties to more easily identify a game.

word_hash.description: A human readable word hash to define this current seed. Will be displayed on the title screen.

hash.description: A non-human readable hash to define this current seed. Will be displayed on the title screen.

session_uuid.description: A UUID to identify this current game.

randovania_version.description: A string that describes the Randovania version used to generate the seed.

patcher_version.description: A string that described the YAMS patcher version used to generate the seed.

starting_location.description: Properties relevant to the starting location in-game.

save_room.description: A number describing which save station to start on. The full list can be found in the language files or in the `set_start_location` script.

rooms.description: A dictionary of internal room names and their properties.

display_name.description: A name for that room, which gets displayed on the minimap and when in the room.

region_name.description: The region name for that room, which gets displayed on the minimap.

minimap_data.description: An array which determines coordinates on the minimap where this room exists.

x.description: The X-coordinate on the minimap of this room.

y.description: The Y-coordinate on the minimap of this room.

septogg_helpers.description: Determines whether Septoggs will spawn to help with platforming.

respawn_bomb_blocks.description: Determines whether bomb blocks will respawn after they've been destroyed.

skip_cutscenes.description: Determines whether gameplay cutscenes will be skipped.

skip_save_cutscene.description: Determines whether the small cutscene that plays when saving will be skipped.

skip_item_cutscenes.description: Determines whether the item collection cutscenes will be skipped.

energy_per_tank.description: Determines how much energy an E-Tank provides. The starting energy is this value minus one.

grave_grotto_blocks.description: Determines whether the bomb blocks between the upper half and the lower half will be there in Grave Grotto.

fusion_mode.description: Determines whether fusion mode will be enabled.

supers_on_missile_doors.description: Determines whether Super Missiles will open Missile doors.

nest_pipes.description: Determines whether The Depths will have new transportation pipes for easier traversal.

softlock_prevention_blocks.description: Determines whether some blocks which can cause softlocks will be removed.

a3_entrance_blocks.description: Determines whether the bomb blocks at the entrance of the Industrial Complex will be there.

screw_blocks.description: Determines whether the pipe rooms will be blocked off by Screw Attack blocks.

sabre_designed_skippy.description: Determines whether Skippy/Player-Autoad will have its designed changed to look like Sabre320's redesign for Skippy the Bot.

locked_missile_text.description: The text that will appear when collecting Missile Expansions without Missile Launcher in the inventory.

locked_super_text.description: The text that will appear when collecting Super Missile Expansions without Super Missile Launcher in the inventory.

locked_pb_text.description: The text that will appear when collecting Power Bomb Expansions without Power Bomb Launcher in the inventory.

require_missile_launcher.description: Determines whether the Missile Launcher is required to fire Missiles.

require_super_launcher.description: Determines whether the Super Missile Launcher is required to fire Super Missiles.

require_pb_launcher.description: Determines whether the Power Bomb Launcher is required to fire Power Bombs.

door_locks.description: Contains properties for door lock rando.

^[0-9]+$.description: The instance ID of the door.

lock.description: The kind of lock this door uses.

septogg_a0.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in Main Caves.

septogg_a1.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in Golden Temple.

septogg_a2.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in Hydro Station.

septogg_a3.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in Industrial Complex.

septogg_a4.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in The Tower.

septogg_a5.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in Distribution Center.

septogg_a6.description: The hint text for the Wisdom Septogg in The Depths.

chozo_labs.description: The hint text for the Chozo statue in the Genetics Laboratory.

credits_spoiler.description: A text which will be prepended to the normal credits. Usually used to contain a spoiler log, as it will not be shown when viewing the credits through the title-screen option. Only when beating the game.

item_text_details.description: Contains text properties for the item collection screen.
